  style: 'currency',
};

// Uncaught TypeError: Currency code is required with currency style.

val.html:
const num = 1000000000;

const formatInUSD = Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', {
  style: 'currency',
  currency: 'USD',
}).format(num);

console.log(formatInUSD);
// $1,000,000,000.00
